Change has been successfully rebased and submitted as 087a751fbae04142d7c95a39b4fd4a37b95a83e5
can we club these two errors together?
Done
That will be incorrect way of writing lg2 logs, 'EID and InstanceID not declared but used' should be the error or something similar, I dont't remember exactly.

Can we improve this message? The message seems to be not clear.
Also, why did we change it to info?
I changed it to info as it was not reporting any error. Do you think otherwise? How do you want the string to be framed ?
Done
why do we need this change? the deamon name is pldm-softpoweroff

I received review comment in one of the commits to make first alphabet of string capital so I did it everywhere - 
https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/70327/comment/3dbb9f34_83f30033/
typo "in"
Done
are you talking about the link you mentioned ? then probably telling it as anti-pattern document would be better.
Done
this commit ?
extra space
Done
Done

i have recently learnt that the correct way to document links is by using the github format for documenting the links.

look at https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/docs/+/70717/comment/54221986_c8619129/ for more info and correct this based on that.
Done

this looks like a paragraph to me, probably rephrase this as 

`MCTP daemon closed the socket, IO exiting with rc {RC}`
Done
typo
Done
how can this be an info , when we are returning PLDM_ERROR in this condition.
Done
add object path and service name, we dont know what failed here
Done

what message is it ? 

if we see this in journal , do we know what message is this ?
Done
not sure if this is making sense , how do we know what message did we get the response for ? audit these type of errors through out the patchset and see if we can add more details into it.
I have reframed based on my understanding. Wherever more information is needed or the string isn't apt, please suggest what the reframing can be I will make the changes.

what is PLDM soft off here?

is it PLDM soft off failure or stoping timer failure?
misleading tracing please correct it all over the patch
Done

is it PLDM soft off failure or getting softPowerOff PDR failure?

misleading tracing please correct it.
Done
if you print softoffConfigJson path then user can decide that file not exist or it's empty with single trace
Done
Failed to get state sensor PDR during softoff
Done

soft off is not failed to receive pldm data but it's failed to receive data during soft off.

soft-off is procedure when remote terminus forcefully shutting down.

misleading trace correct it.
Done
"Failure to start remote terminus soft off wait timer, Exit the pldm-softpoweroff with response code:{NUM}""
Done

misleading trace.
rephase like:
"Failed to process request while remote terminus soft off"
Done
